articles.title: Good Lock: Now Available for All Samsung Users
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has globally launched its Good Lock app, providing Galaxy users with advanced customization options. Good Lock functions as a modular system, allowing users to personalize themes, lock screens, notification panels, and multitasking views. This wider availability of Good Lock is expected to enhance user experience and give Samsung a competitive advantage.

articles.title: Samsung's latest rugged devices are keeping old-school mobile traditions alive
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy XCover 7 Pro and Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro, two new rugged devices featuring removable backplates and user-replaceable batteries. The Galaxy XCover 7 Pro includes Galaxy AI features like Circle to Search and Object Eraser and uses a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip.

articles.title: The Robots Have Arrived, But Are They Allowed To Boink On OnlyFans?
articles.author: Hazel Hawke
articles.summary: OnlyFans now allows AI-generated content on its platform, provided it is clearly labeled and features the verified creator. This update empowers creators with tools to expand their content, such as generating background scenes and special effects, while still adhering to the platform's existing rules and Acceptable Use Policy. The focus is on assisting creators in their work, not replacing them or allowing the creation of harmful content.

articles.title: OPPO Nigeria expands product line with A5 Pro
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: OPPO Nigeria has launched the A5 Pro, a durable smartphone designed for the Nigerian market. The A5 Pro features IP69-rated resistance to water, sand, and dust, a military-grade build, a 5,800 mAh battery, and AI LinkBoost technology for improved connectivity. It also includes an AI Editor for photo and video editing, and a VC-Cooler function for temperature regulation.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers snap up brand new Baileys dupe flavour that's 50% cheaper than original but fans are divided over taste
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Aldi has launched several new Ballycastle liqueur flavors, including the Honeycomb Cream, a limited-edition flavor priced at £6.99. Prior to that, Aldi launched the Ballycastle Stout Flavour Country Cream for £7.99, featuring malt notes balanced by Irish cream sweetness, and the Ballycastle S'mores Country Cream which mixed chocolate, biscuit, vanilla and marshmallow flavours.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers snap up brand new Baileys dupe flavour that's 50% cheaper than original but fans are divided over taste
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a limited-edition Ballycastle Honeycomb Cream liqueur in UK stores, priced at £7.99. This follows the introduction of the Ballycastle Stout Flavour Country Cream last month, which was priced at £6.99 and featured malt notes balanced by Irish cream sweetness. In October 2024, Aldi also launched the Ballycastle S'mores Country Cream, which mixed chocolate, biscuit, vanilla and marshmallow flavors.

articles.title: Aldi confirms over 280 ‘Summer Essentials' are back in stock starting at just $1.09 and cheaper than Dollar Tree
articles.author: Jacob Willeford
articles.summary: ALDI launched its Summer Seasonal Products and Groceries drop for 2025, featuring over 280 items, including food, drinks, and sunscreen, at affordable prices. The new selection includes items like Beef Bouillon Cubes and Chicken Bouillon Cubes for $1.09 and Chocolate and Strawberry Ice Cream Crunch Bars for $3.29.

articles.title: From food to factories, Neubility is getting smart on robot intelligence
articles.summary: Neubility has launched Neubie Patrol, a patrolling robot, and is developing a humanoid-like robot designed for use in distribution centers. The company's first product was a delivery robot named Neubie. The company is focusing on versatile robot intelligence and is licensing their Neubility Sense software to other firms, for their robot intelligence solution business.

articles.title: Unlock soft-serve magic from your home
articles.author: Brandt Ranj
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced the Ninja Swirl, a new dessert-focused appliance that builds upon the foundation of the Ninja Creami and Slushi. The Ninja Swirl allows users to make both scoopable ice cream and soft serve at home, with six soft serve functions and easy-to-use controls. It comes with two pint containers and a recipe book, offering options for various flavor combinations and catering to both new and experienced ice cream makers.

articles.title: Sinosilk Introduces Innovative High-Resolution Double-Sided Silk Printing Solution
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Sinosilk has introduced an innovative double-sided silk printing solution. This new technology achieves exceptional resolution and vibrant colors, opening opportunities for retailers, artists, and consumers. The solution allows for complex designs previously limited by traditional methods.

articles.title: All The Best Deals At Walmart This Week
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Walmart is offering significant discounts on various products, including up to 86% off on select items such as spring dresses and air fryers. Walmart+ members can enjoy exclusive offers during Walmart+ Week starting April 28, which includes free Express Delivery and access to Paramount+ with SHOWTIME. Flash deals are available on items such as ruffly tiered midi dresses and Google 4K projectors.

articles.title: 6 ways innovation thrives in Dyson
articles.author: Joyce Reyes-Aguila
articles.summary: Dyson engineers developed the Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer, adding features like the Scalp Protect mode to enhance hair and scalp health. The hair dryer has tailored heat and flow settings for each attachment for optimal styling results. The company also relies on AI to improve processes and release products early.

articles.title: These face tanning drops deliver the most natural sun-kissed glow
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: A French skincare brand has released its first fake tan formula.

articles.title: Redcar Raises $5.3M Seed Led by Khosla Ventures and Pre-Seed Led by humbition to Launch F1: The AI Sales Agent That Makes Reps Superhuman
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Redcar has launched a new AI-powered sales agent called F1 Agent, designed to automate tedious sales tasks for B2B teams. The F1 Agent mimics the workflows of a team's best-performing reps and automates research, lead qualification, and personalized messaging. Redcar aims to scale sales teams and allow human sales reps to focus on closing deals by automating the time-consuming part of the sales process.

articles.title: Is using Google's apps better than using the ones already on my phone?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: The article recommends alternative services like the Samsung browser, WhatsApp, and Spotify over Google's default apps for users of new Samsung phones. It suggests Google Chrome, Messages, Photos, and Gemini/Assistant are essential while offering choices for browsers, messengers, file browsers, and music services. The goal is to help users experiment and customize their smartphone experience.

articles.title: Media Insider: Sky TV switches to new satellite - ‘huge relief' as months of bad reception come to an end
articles.author: Shayne Currie
articles.summary: Sky TV has successfully switched to a new satellite, Koreasat 6, to improve signal strength for New Zealand customers. The switchover process may require some customers to restart their Sky Box. The company is addressing potential signal issues in specific regions by upgrading dishes and engaging with affected customers.

articles.title: Samsung AI-powered appliances in 2025: Your questions answered
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 Bespoke AI home appliance range, including refrigerators with enhanced AI and connectivity like the 809L Bespoke AI Family Hub French Door Refrigerator retailing from $6,999.00 and the 615L AI Home Side-by-Side Refrigerator, and the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra cordless stick vacuum with 400W suction power priced from $1,699.00. These new appliances focus on AI-powered convenience, energy efficiency, and connectivity through the SmartThings ecosystem, with the goal of seamless integration and personalized user experiences.

articles.title: Android 15 Says Goodbye to 16GB Phones
articles.author: Corbin Davenport
articles.summary: Google is requiring Android 15 devices with the Google Play Store to have at least 32GB of internal storage. This new Google Mobile Services agreement affects new devices and devices updating to Android 15 and closes the door on 16GB devices. This ensures a baseline acceptable experience in the Android ecosystem.

articles.title: Unisize, a sizing recommendation software for fashion apparel e-commerce, releases a new demo of 'FaceChange' ...
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Unisize, a virtual try-on software provider, has released a new demo of its 'FaceChange' AI function. This update is specifically designed for fashion apparel e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: Android 15: Higher Minimum Storage Requirement
articles.author: Investigative Tech Reporter
articles.summary: Google is mandating a minimum of 32GB of flash storage for Android 15 devices, impacting entry-level devices. This requirement restricts access to Google Mobile Services (GMS) for devices with less storage, which includes essential apps like Google Play Store. This change may lead to an increase in the price points of budget-friendly devices.

articles.title: My Secret to Low-Effort Supple Skin Is This Luxe Shower Oil
articles.summary: L'Occitane launched Almond Shower Oil, available in a 16.9-ounce 100% recycled plastic bottle for refills priced around $45. The product is marketed as a solution for dry skin, providing moisturization without leaving a greasy feel.

articles.title: Fresh Flavor Alert: McDonald's Rolls Out New Lemonade Nationwide, Including in California Locations
articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a new lemonade product called McDonald's Premium Lemonade across the U.S., replacing Minute Maid Lemonade. The new lemonade is made with five ingredients and has received positive feedback for its fresh taste and real lemon bits.

articles.title: The Viral Headphones Reviewers Say Are An Affordable Alternative To AirPods Are 30% Off Today
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Tozo launched the NC9 noise-canceling and waterproof Bluetooth earbuds, a budget-friendly alternative to pricier options. The earbuds feature an IPX6 waterproof rating, long battery life, and a professional tuning system, and can be personalized using the Tozo app.

articles.title: 20 Cheap Target Beauty Products That Are So Good, Gatekeeping Them Would Feel Like A Crime
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: The article highlights new beauty product offerings. E.l.f. introduced a contour palette and a lip mask, while Weleda promotes its Skin Food cream. Maybelline's mascara and Neutrogena's Hydro Boost sheet mask are highlighted for their effectiveness, while Kristin Ess promotes sulfate-free shampoo. Odele features a leave-in detangling tonic, while Tree Hut offers Tropic Glow whipped body butter.

articles.title: Jack in the Box Revamps a Cult-Favorite: Pineapple Express Returns as the All-New Pink Pineapple Express
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Jack in the Box Inc. is launching the Pink Pineapple Express platform. This new platform includes three flavor-packed drinks and a $4.20 deal. The company also features an exclusive collaboration.

articles.title: AI Video Creation with Runway, Sora & ChatGPT
articles.author: Lachezar Arabadzhiev
articles.summary: Runway ML and Sora offer innovative features for AI-powered video generation. These platforms transform video content production.

articles.title: Amazon's New Nova Sonic AI Model Features a ‘More Human-like Voice'
articles.author: Kara Sherrer
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Nova Sonic, a new AI foundation model unifying speech understanding and generation. This model is available via a new API in Amazon Bedrock. Furthermore, Amazon has introduced Amazon Nova Act for web browser actions and Amazon Nova Canvas for generating high-quality images. An Amazon Nova SDK is also available for developers.

articles.title: A dream come true: Northern Ireland sleep and seating specialists bring newest home haven with new store opening
articles.author: Claire Cartmill
articles.summary: Dreams and Sofatime opened a new store in Londonderry on April 18th. The store will feature Dreams' exclusive Sleepmatch technology, which scans a customer's body to provide personalized mattress recommendations. This technology will assist customers in finding their ideal mattress.

articles.title: You can hot swap the battery on Samsung's new rugged tablet
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the upcoming launch of the Galaxy XCover7 Pro smartphone, slated for May 8th, 2025, and the Galaxy Tab Active5 Pro tablet, arriving in June 2025. Both rugged devices feature improved battery life and are designed for challenging environments, with the tablet offering a 'dual hot-swap' battery feature. The Galaxy Tab Active5 Pro includes a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor, 120Hz display, and increased touch sensitivity.

articles.title: Advise launches bot for brands after €8m investment
articles.author: Niall Kitson
articles.summary: Advise, a Dublin-based data, analytics, and AI platform developer, has launched a new GenAI agent. This agent, an update to Advise's AI-powered SaaS platform, helps brands reach actionable insights faster. The new agent trained to augment the role of the category manager, understanding product performance and optimizing new product, pricing, and promotion strategies.

articles.title: 5 NYSC Camp Essentials and Where to Get Them
articles.author: Gloria Adesanya
articles.summary: A+ NYSC Kits offers kits starting from ₦28,000, including essentials like clothing, stationery, and toiletries. Khaki Corper provides a Good to Go Kit for ₦85,000, encompassing clothing, mosquito nets, and stationery, alongside tailored khaki uniforms. Koppa NYSC Kits offers various packages ranging from ₦20,000 to ₦60,000, featuring different combinations of t-shirts, shorts, sneakers, water bottles, and other camp essentials.

articles.title: Peak Milk Rolls Out 'Peak Mini' To Make Nutrition Affordable For All Nigerians
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria Plc, producer of Peak Milk, has introduced Peak Mini, a smaller and more affordable pack of its signature Peak Evaporated Milk. Peak Mini aims to provide the same rich, creamy taste and high-quality nutrition in a smaller portion.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS Essence Turbo review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: MG launched the ZS Turbo Essence, a new variant of their small SUV, in 2025. It features a more powerful engine compared to the base model, along with enhanced interior features and safety technology. The ZS Turbo Essence aims to offer a balance of performance and value within the MG ZS range.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS Essence Turbo review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: MG launched the MG ZS Turbo Essence, a new variant of its ZS SUV. It offers a more powerful turbo-petrol engine compared to the entry-level Essence model, along with enhanced performance and features. This model is positioned as a "sweet spot" in the ZS range, balancing affordability with improved driving experience.

articles.title: Cream Stone enters premium packaged segment with ‘TUBZ', eyes pan-India retail expansion
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Cream Stone has launched 'Cream Stone TUBZ,' a premium line of packaged ice creams, marking the brand's entry into the retail segment. Available in twelve flavors and different sizes, TUBZ is currently available at Cream Stone outlets in Hyderabad and via Swiggy Instamart, with plans for further expansion across India.

articles.title: Powered_by Agency Launches Virtual SE, Revolutionizing Pre-Sales Engineering with AI Agents
articles.summary: Powered_by Agency launched Virtual SE, an AI agent designed for pre-sales engineering. Virtual SE helps SaaS sales representatives by answering technical questions, providing product overviews, and qualifying sales opportunities on platforms like Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.

articles.title: BRUHM boosts market engagement with retail expansion, direct consumer outreach
articles.summary: BRUHM is expanding its retail presence in Ghana with a new Shop-in-Shop model at Electromart's Atomic Junction store and promotional bundles including a free fan with selected air conditioner purchases as part of its Easter campaign. Ghanaian music icon Reggie Rockstone was presented with a BRUHM chest freezer as part of the retail launch.

articles.title: Tech Help Canada May Be the First AI-Integrated Small Business Blog
articles.summary: Tech Help Canada has launched an AI-integrated small business blog featuring HelperX Bot. This AI assistant allows users to interact with content by summarizing information, clarifying topics, and providing assistance with tasks like drafting marketing emails, directly within the blog page. This service aims to help small businesses grow by combining informative content, on-page AI, and direct services.

articles.title: AICupid: The Ultimate NSFW AI Girlfriend Platform
articles.author: Aicupid
articles.summary: AICupid launched AICupid, a new AI girlfriend companion service, providing customizable and lifelike experiences using AI technology. The service offers meaningful connections, fun conversations, and imaginative designs, setting a new standard for AI companionship.

articles.title: How to keep your AI prompts from going off the rails
articles.author: Lindsey Bradshaw
articles.summary: The article presents a guide on using AI for tasks such as writing pitches for new product launches and developing PR strategies. It provides methods to refine AI outputs, including challenging its responses and using layered prompts. Additionally, the article suggests using constraints to enhance creativity and tailoring AI responses to mimic real-world styles for product announcements.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS Essence Turbo review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: MG is introducing the MG ZS Essence Turbo, building on the new-generation ZS with improvements in sophistication, agreeable pricing, and a punchier powertrain compared to entry-level variants. The MG ZS Essence Turbo includes a significant increase in performance with a 54% boost in power and 96% increase in torque for an additional $2000, and also offers a 10-year/250,000km warranty for private buyers.

articles.title: How deep research can help you do PR better
articles.author: Ayelet Noff
articles.summary: The article highlights the use of AI-powered tools in developing PR strategies for launching new products. For example, AI can help identify relevant media verticals and timely story angles for an AI-powered decision workflow software launch.  It also provides guidance on analyzing media coverage and sentiment to refine messaging for a next-gen crypto marketplace launch, ensuring alignment with audience sentiment and avoiding potential PR missteps.

articles.title: Google Cloud is leaning on all its strengths to support enterprise AI
articles.author: Rory Bathgate
articles.summary: Google Cloud at Google Cloud Next 2025 unveiled a slew of new products and services focusing on providing infrastructure for customers to choose their models. The company emphasized its infrastructure and networking capabilities for delivering powerful AI, moving away from direct competition in AI model development.

articles.title: Bowled Over for Açaí: OAKBERRY Launches Newly Expanded Signature Bowl Menu
articles.summary: OAKBERRY launched its new Signature Bowl menu, featuring six layered açaí bowls and a matcha chia pudding topping. The new menu, available nationwide, includes the Original and Crunchy bowls along with four customizable layered açaí bowls with fruits, nut butters, and toppings like collagen and whey protein. This launch expands OAKBERRY's açaí bowl offerings.

articles.title: Netflix Unveils AI Search Feature – Here's How It Will Revolutionize How You Find Movies and Shows
articles.author: Vanshika Tyagi
articles.summary: Netflix has started testing a new AI-driven search feature in partnership with OpenAI.  This feature, currently available on iOS for select users, allows users to search for movies and shows by moods, themes, or descriptions. Netflix will refine the feature based on feedback and may expand it to other platforms in the future.

articles.title: Celebrating 18 Years of Olight: Illuminating Dreams for 20+ Million Users Globally
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Olight celebrated its 18th anniversary by launching three new products and the "My First Olight" storytelling campaign. In 2024, Olight introduced OAL™ aluminum in flashlights and expanded its product line with the Ostation X power station. Olight also enhanced its core products with three exceptional new releases.

articles.title: Debenhams deal cuts 76% off £159 hairdryer that gives 'salon quality results'
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Debenhams is offering the Erth Skin London Professional Pro Hair Dryer at a discounted price. Watermans Grow Me Shampoo is available for purchase on Amazon at a reduced price. Also Remington ONE Dry & Style Hair Dryer which helps protect against extreme heat damage from £99.99 to £66.65 at Boots.

articles.title: Netflix to get ChatGPT-powered search engine to recommend TV shows and movies
articles.author: DH Web Desk
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing a new AI-based search technology. This technology promises users better recommendations compared to traditional methods based on actors, titles, or genres. The goal is to enhance user experience by providing more personalized and relevant content suggestions.

articles.title: Next shoppers say £47 dress is 'lovely and summery' and 'you'll receive lots of compliments'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the 'Button Down Puff Sleeve Midi Dress with Linen' for £47. The dress features puff sleeves, button-down fastening, pockets, and comes in various prints and sizes. Customer reviews suggest the dress is lovely and summery, although some have expressed disappointment with the fit and material.

articles.title: 'I tested the Cosori Dual Twin air fryer - it will make a perfect Easter Sunday lunch'
articles.author: Nicola Croal
articles.summary: COSORI launched the Dual Blaze Twin Fry, a 10-litre capacity air fryer with six cooking functions, including Air Fry, Bake, Roast, Dry, Grill, and Reheat. The COSORI TwinFry ensures even cooking due to its four strategically placed heating elements. It is available at Currys for a limited time deal of £199.

articles.title: Netflix is Testing a New OpenAI-Powered Search
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new OpenAI-powered search feature. This new search functionality aims to change how viewers find shows and movies within the streaming platform. The company is addressing the issue of endless scrolling to find something to watch.

articles.title: Sprout Social Propels Brands into a New Era of Influence with AI-Powered Innovations to its ...
articles.author: Sprout Social
articles.summary: Sprout Social has unveiled its reimagined influencer marketing platform, which features an updated design and AI-driven natural language discovery. This new platform enables brands to identify creators through topic-led search, allowing them to foster authentic partnerships and drive revenue.

articles.title: Samsung unveils XCover7 Pro rugged smartphone, Active5 Pro tablet
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy XCover7 Pro smartphone and Galaxy Tab Active5 Pro tablet, ruggedized devices aimed at enterprise users. The Galaxy XCover7 Pro features a 6.6-inch LCD touchscreen with a 120 Hz refresh rate and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset.

articles.title: Nobody's Child new in for summer fashion
articles.author: Aimee Robinson
articles.summary: Nobody's Child has launched its new summer range featuring denim shorts priced at £59, a black embroidered maxi dress for £79, and tailored butter yellow shorts and waistcoats costing £65 and £75 respectively. The collection also includes white linen-blend trousers for £65 and a brown linen-blend tie-front top retailing at £49.

articles.title: POET Broadens Customer Engagements Following Showcase of Groundbreaking Products
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: POET Technologies Inc. announced new customer engagement following live demonstrations of the POET Teralight™ line of 1.6T transmit and receive optical engines. The company also debuted POET Blazar™, a new external light source designed to reduce costs significantly.

articles.title: TWSC Showcases Full-Stack Customization at Global Sources Consumer Electronics Show
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: TWSC showcased its AI PC and QLC NAND flash memory innovations and new storage solutions, including high-performance PCIe 4.0 SSD, TB-scale micro SD card, and high-speed portable storage, at the Global Sources Consumer Electronics Show. Its sub-brand CUSU K5 PSSD also secured the Best Product Design Awards. TWSC is set to debut more innovations at the Global Sourcing Fair in Vietnam.

articles.title: Rs 10 packs turn into FMCG's hottest summer battleground
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Rasna has launched a fruit drink concentrate in Rs 10 sachets. Reliance has relaunched Campa Cola at Rs 10. Mother Dairy has added mango lassi and pudina chaach to its line of Rs 10 packs. PepsiCo has introduced a no-sugar beverage in Hyderabad at the same price. Amul launched Tru, a dairy-based fruit drink priced at Rs 10.

articles.title: AI-Media Unveils LEXI Voice at NAB Show 2025 - Global Reach with Live AI-Powered Voice Translation
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: AI-Media demonstrated its LEXI Voice solution live for the first time at NAB, showcasing its real-time multilingual engagement capabilities. The company unveiled data in February 2024 showing LEXI's superiority over traditional human workflows. LEXI Voice transforms what's possible in real-time multilingual engagement.

articles.title: Organic Sex Toys Made for Skin, Built for Pleasure
articles.summary: The article introduces 'organic sex toys', which are crafted with natural ingredients like body-safe silicone or recycled materials, avoiding synthetic fillers and harsh additives. These toys focus on safety, comfort, and sustainability, using eco-friendly packaging and vegan-friendly options. They address a growing consumer demand for pleasure products that are both body-conscious and environmentally responsible.

articles.title: 31 Fun And Interesting Products You May Have Never Seen Before
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of several new products, including Eos' Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, Medicube Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer, and Cheerie Lane popcorn pods. These products range from skincare to snacks and are all available on Amazon or through the company's own website. The products are all recently introduced or new.

articles.title: Samsung's latest rugged devices are keeping old-school mobile traditions alive
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy XCover 7 Pro and Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro, rugged devices featuring removable batteries. The Galaxy XCover 7 Pro smartphone, targeted at enterprise customers, includes Galaxy AI features and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip. The Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro tablet offers enhanced charging options and shares durability features. The Galaxy XCover 7 Pro is available on May 8, 2025 and Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro is scheduled to be released in "early June".

articles.title: Samsung's New Rugged Phone Is Made for Work Sites, Has a Replaceable Battery and AI
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy XCover7 Pro, a rugged phone with enhanced battery, processor, and AI capabilities, along with the Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro, a rugged tablet featuring a 120Hz refresh rate and AI features. The XCover7 Pro will be available on May 8, and the Galaxy Tab Active 5 Pro in early June.

articles.title: This Amazon Electric Spring Scrubber Is on Sale for $40
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Leebein has launched the Electric Spin Scrubber, a cleaning gadget with multiple brush head attachments, two spin speeds, and an adjustable arm. It is available on Amazon and is currently discounted for Prime members.

articles.title: Heretics in the Heights: The Observer gets witchy
articles.author: The Observer
articles.summary: Arkansas Heretic, a new store, has opened its doors, offering a kava bar and various Wiccan and non-Christian related items, including organic loose leaf tea and tarot card guidebooks. The store also aims to build community through events in its space.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy big beauty staple in middle aisle – and it costs just €9.99
articles.author: Emma Mooney
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched a new manicure and pedicure set priced at €9.99, featuring multiple attachments and speed settings. Additionally, Lidl is selling a balcony/fence privacy screen, now marked down to €6.99, which is weather and UV resistant and available in three colors.

articles.title: From baby sold for ₹600 to building ₹3,400 crore empire, meet ‘Dairy Godfather'
articles.summary: Niu Gensheng launched Aice, an ice cream brand in 2015, targeting low-income consumers in Southeast Asia, with a focus on Indonesia. Aice offered quality products at accessible prices and introduced regionally popular flavors, becoming Southeast Asia's leading ice cream brand.

articles.title: LG Display rolls out AI coffee robots for Paju campus employees
articles.author: 근현대 기행
articles.summary: LG Display has introduced an AI-powered robot delivery service at its Paju production complex, enabling employees to receive coffee deliveries from an on-site café via autonomous outdoor robots. The delivery robots, provided by Woowa Brothers, navigate the large campus to reduce walking time for employees, with full-scale operations planned to start on April 21st, 2025.

articles.title: Wendy's® opens in Mega Mall Bucharest on 24th of April
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Wendy's has launched its first restaurant in Bucharest, Romania on April 24th at Mega Mall Bucharest. The launch included a celebration with music, games, and a TikTok studio booth. The restaurant offers iconic menu items like the Baconator, made with 100% fresh Romanian beef, and the Spicy Chicken Sandwich, with ingredients sourced locally.

articles.title: Fujifilm unveils Instax Mini 41 instant camera with retro feel
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Fujifilm is launching its new entry-level Instax instant camera, the Instax Mini 41, in South Africa this week, with a suggested retail price of R2 249. The Mini 41 prints photos instantly and features a Close-up Mode and a selfie mirror. Users can scan their printed photos using the Instax UP! App on a smartphone.

articles.title: Netflix And OpenAI Partner Up: Soon Users Might Be Able To Search Content Based On Their Mood
articles.summary: Netflix, in collaboration with OpenAI, is testing a new AI-powered search feature aimed at revolutionizing content discovery. The feature is currently available in Australia and New Zealand for iOS users only, allowing users to search based on their mood or detailed descriptions, and testing will also take place in the US in the coming weeks and months.

articles.title: vivo V50 Lite is out now
articles.author: Jonathan Castillo
articles.summary: vivo has launched the V50 Lite smartphone, priced at P13,999. The phone features a 50MP camera, a 6500mAh battery with 90W FlashCharge, and BlueVolt technology supporting a five-year battery health guarantee. The V50 Lite is available in three colors and powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300, with pre-order deals available from April 12 to 25.

articles.title: Electro Depot: Balai Vacuum Cleaner Under €100
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Valberg Cyclonic S9, a cordless stick vacuum, is introduced as a lightweight and affordable cleaning solution targeting budget-conscious U.S. consumers. It features a motorized brush head, a 600ml dustbin, and includes a wall mount for storage and charging, offering versatility for both floor and handheld cleaning tasks. Electro depot presents an accessible chance to own the Valberg Cyclonic S9 vacuum cleaner at a price of 99.98 euros.

articles.title: Bargain brand butter named better than Lurpak and costs half the price
articles.author: Emilia Randall
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak spreadable butter has been introduced and recognized as a top choice in a blind taste test, outperforming Lurpak due to its taste and cost-effectiveness. M&S Lightly Salted Butter Blend and Morrisons Salted Spreadable were also successful new spreadable butter offerings, surpassing Lurpak in performance.

articles.title: Bargain supermarket butter named better and cheaper than Lurpak
articles.author: Emilia Randall
articles.summary: Aldi's Nordpak spreadable butter has been named superior to Lurpak in a blind taste test conducted by Which?. Aldi's Nordpak was praised for its creaminess, color, and balanced flavor, and also deemed more cost-effective at £2.18 for 500g. Other supermarket brands like M&S Lightly Salted Butter Blend and Morrisons Salted Spreadable also outperformed Lurpak.

articles.title: 'Move over Dyson, the Bissell CrossWave OmniForce Edge is the new hoover king'
articles.author: Andrew Jameson
articles.summary: Bissell has launched a new wet dry vacuum cleaner that offers versatile cleaning with inbuilt mop and dedicated dry-cleaning function using power vac mode. The vacuum includes features like ZeroGap edge cleaning technology, a user-friendly interface, and a 3-in-1 docking station for charging and self-cleaning. The Bissell vacuum offers convenience and efficiency in floor cleaning.

articles.title: If You're Counting Down The Days Until An Upcoming Trip, Then It's Time To Buy These 29 Travel Products
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of travel products available on Amazon, ranging from luggage organizers to comfort and security enhancers. These include items like packing cubes, luggage scales, TSA-friendly toiletry kits, travel adapters, phone mounts, compression socks, portable door locks, and even white-noise machines. The products aim to streamline travel, enhance comfort, and provide solutions to common travel-related challenges, according to product descriptions and user reviews.

articles.title: Acer ZX And ZX Pro Smartphones Launching in India : Here's What You Can Expect
articles.summary: Acer is launching its new ZX and ZX Pro smartphones in the Indian market on April 15, 2025. These phones, designed, manufactured, and distributed in partnership with Indkal Technologies, are targeted towards tech enthusiasts and everyday users, featuring competitive specs and sleek designs. The launch aims to establish Acer's presence in the mobile market.

articles.title: Space NK launches luxe £70 shower edit featuring £165 worth of relaxing products
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Space NK has introduced the "Everything Shower Edit," a set of bath and skincare products priced at £70, featuring items from brands like Living Proof and Sol de Janeiro. Additionally, LookFantastic has launched the "Travel Edit," a set of mini travel essentials available for £30, containing products from La Roche-Posay and L'Occitane.

articles.title: ⚡Know Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Specifications, Features and Expected Price
articles.summary: Motorola will launch the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus in India tomorrow. The new phone features military-grade protection, with confirmed specifications and features.

articles.title: Entries open for The Grocer's New Product & Packaging Awards 2025
articles.author: The Grocer
articles.summary: The Grocer's New Product & Packaging Awards 2025 are open for entries, celebrating branded product innovation and packaging development in the grocery sector. The awards cover 53 categories, including Eco Pack of the Year and Innovative Pack of the Year, with entries rigorously evaluated by industry experts. Last year's winners included Gü Double Chocolate Brownies, Peter's Yard Oregano & Olive Oil Sourdough Crackers, and Ordo Hydro Sonic Water Flosser.

articles.title: Fully-loaded Volkswagen Golf 8. 5 TSI nearly the price of a GTI - is it worth it?
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Volkswagen South Africa (VWSA) reintroduced the Golf 1.4 TSI models due to delays in the Golf 8.5 GTI launch and to maintain the Golf nameplate presence. These models are priced from R580,900 to R688,100, offering an alternative to the performance-focused GTI model, with features like Matrix LED headlights and Vienna leather seats in the R-Line Plus variant.

articles.title: Free NSFW AI, Smarter AI Girlfriend: Crushon AI's New Era Starts Now
articles.author: CRUSHON AI CORP
articles.summary: Crushon AI launched a new update to its emotionally intelligent chatbot, featuring a rewritten Free NSFW AI experience. The update includes intelligent models, dynamic relationship settings, and safety tools, aiming to provide users with long-term AI Companions, romantic AI Girlfriends, and Spicy AI Chat without registration, queues, or paywalls.

articles.title: Discover smarter deeper cleaning with the Roomba Plus 505 Combo Robot and AutoWash Dock
articles.author: Liam McCann
articles.summary: Roomba is offering discounts on new robot vacuum models. The Roomba Plus 505 Combo Robot + AutoWash Dock is on sale for £549, featuring self-cleaning, advanced mapping, and voice control. Also the Roomba 205 DustCompactor™ Combo Robot available with discount removes the need for a self-emptying station, and Roomba Plus 405 Combo Robot and AutoWash Dock eradicates messes on carpets, wood and tiled floors using vacuuming, mopping or combo-cleaning programs.

articles.title: Aldi is selling £25 garden essential that's £50 cheaper than Bosch version and will help your patio sparkle
articles.author: Fabulous Digital Writer
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Patio and Wall Cleaner for £24.99 on April 17, a cheaper alternative to similar products like the Bosch AquaSurf. Additionally, Aldi is releasing the FERREX Small Pressure Washer for £39.99, offering a budget-friendly option compared to brands like Karcher.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Review: A phone that ticks nearly all the boxes
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, succeeding the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion, with a starting price of ₹22,999. The phone features a vegan leather finish, a 6.7-inch pOLED display, and is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chipset. It also includes a 50 MP primary camera and a 5,500 mAh battery with 68W fast charging.

articles.title: The distribution industry attracts attention by introducing a series of character products. From T-s..
articles.author: Kim Hyeon-Jung
articles.summary: Samsung C&T's 8 Seconds launched a Pokémon collection with clothing and accessories. Starbucks Korea introduced Hello Kitty collaboration merchandise and Snoopy-themed food and beverages. E-Land World's Spao and Spao Kids launched collections in collaboration with Catch! Tiniping and Wish Cat.

articles.title: ⚡Know Expected Samsung Galaxy M56 Price, Specs and Features Ahead of April 17, 2025 Launch
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 Stylus in India. OnePlus 13T teaser leaked ahead of launch in China, revealing changes in design and camera module with expected specifications, features, and price.

articles.title: ⚡Edge 60 Stylus Launch in India Tomorrow; Check Expected Price, Specs
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 Stylus in India on April 15. The Edge 60 Stylus will include features like a built-in stylus, Snapdragon processor, Sony camera, and pOLED display.

articles.title: This Robot Vacuum and Mop Is Almost 50% Cheaper Than on Black Friday, Amazon Is Going All In
articles.author: Gizmodo Deals
articles.summary: The Dreame L10s Ultra robot vacuum and mop combo is currently available for $299, a 62% discount from its standard price of $789. This complete cleaning system features a multi-functional docking station that automates dust collection, mop washing and drying, water refilling, and cleaning solution addition.

articles.title: CarryMinati Teams Up with KFC India for Saucy Popcorn Drop
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: KFC India has partnered with CarryMinati to introduce a new menu item, Saucy Popcorn, a twist on their Chicken Popcorn coated in Nashville Sauce. The product features limited-edition packaging with CarryMinati's image and includes a custom spork designed for gamers, supported by the #BuyOrCry campaign targeting Gen Z.

articles.title: For Android: How to personalize your Meesho notifications
articles.summary: Meesho allows users to personalize notifications within its Android app. Customization includes selecting notification types such as updates on new products and offers, setting time preferences, and leveraging data insights for personalized content. These options aim to enhance user engagement and tailor the shopping experience.

articles.title: Online mystery boxes: Are they worth it? What you need to know before buying
articles.author: Jao Malapo
articles.summary: Online mystery boxes are packages containing random items, including gadgets, with varying value and potential risks. Jemlit is presented as a safer platform for purchasing mystery boxes, offering clear odds and guaranteed value. The value and worth of such purchase depends on the platform used and the buyer's risk tolerance.

articles.title: MTU celebrates launch of 15 new businesses
articles.author: Rachel Lysaght
articles.summary: Fifteen new businesses, encompassing sectors like sustainability, biotechnology, digital services, and consumer goods, launched following their graduation from the New Frontiers Programme at Munster Technological University (MTU). These businesses received hands-on support and mentorship throughout the start-up journey from Enterprise Ireland and The Rubicon Centre. The graduating businesses include Triple Edge Energy Ltd, Genni, Mindful Maker, A.Chara Ltd, The Natural Veterinary Co, EcoRoots Ltd, Zhy Biotechnologies Ltd, Quartz.io, Noonan's Control Method, Kookease, TowerWatch Ltd, RowTeic Ltd, AllYouKnead.ie, The Alternative Christmas Pudding and Boots2Base.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A56 Review: Pretty Face With Average Pace
articles.author: Yashraj Verma
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A56, a mid-range smartphone with a premium design and a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. It features a 50MP primary camera and supports 45W charging (though no adapter is included), and runs on Android 15 with One UI 7, with six years of promised updates. The phone is powered by Exynos 1580. It is launched around Rs 40,000 - Rs 45,000 price bracket.

articles.title: Nova Sign Unveils Innovative Vehicle Branding Options to Boost Your Business Exposure in Dubai
articles.summary: Nova Sign has launched new vehicle branding options in Dubai, including full vehicle wraps and custom graphics, designed to increase brand exposure for businesses. The company aims to help businesses stand out and reach their target audience with these innovative solutions. These options will allow businesses to reach a wider audience as their vehicles travel around the city.

articles.title: Accelerating Innovation – The Role of AI-Powered Cloud Platforms in Rapid Experimentation
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Yotta launches the Yotta Shakti Cloud Platform, an AI-driven cloud service designed to enable businesses to experiment, iterate, and scale AI applications rapidly. The platform features a comprehensive AI development environment, high-performance training infrastructure, seamless deployment capabilities, optimized GPU utilization, cost-efficiency, and a self-service portal.

articles.title: Can dumber phone cure ‘brain rot'? Light Phone III tries to take you back to simpler times
articles.author: Brian X. Chen
articles.summary: Light has launched the Light Phone III, a minimalist phone designed to reduce distractions. The Light Phone III, priced at $600, offers basic functionalities like calls, texts, photos, maps, music, and podcasts. It excludes features like a web browser and app store, aiming to provide a less stressful and more focused user experience.

articles.title: The Curator's ultimate body care routine: Your head-to-toe glow-up guide
articles.author: Adriana Monachino
articles.summary: Nivea offers a rich, ultra-hydrating cream in its nostalgic blue tin. Sephora features Sol de Janeiro's fan-favorite fragrance mist with notes of pistachio, salted caramel, and vanilla for hair, skin, or clothes. L'Occitane features a silky oil transforms into a gentle, milky lather that leaves skin soft and infused with almond oil

articles.title: Netflix tests new AI search engine to recommend shows, movies
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new AI-powered search technology for subscribers, allowing them to find TV shows and movies using specific terms, including their mood. The OpenAI-powered search engine is currently available on iOS devices for customers in Australia and New Zealand, with plans to expand to the US and other markets.

articles.title: Digital Assault Ai Officially Launches, Delivering Enterprise-Grade Marketing Tools and ...
articles.author: Digital Assault Ai
articles.summary: DIGITAL ASSAULT AI, a comprehensive SaaS platform combining Vendasta and GoHighLevel, launched nationally. The platform offers marketing automation tools and dashboards targeting entrepreneurs, agencies, and small business owners.  It aims to disrupt the market with affordable pricing.

articles.title: Grow the perfect flowerbed with 'brilliant' concept made easy for beginners
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: Garden on a Roll offers a new service for beginner gardeners: pre-designed garden border kits. The kits include a biodegradable template, selected plants, organic feed, gardening gloves, and a hand trowel, allowing users to easily create a stylish garden.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's Favorite $17 Cleanser is Perfect for Hydrating Dry Skin
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: La Roche-Posay's Toleriane Hydrating Face Cleanser, a $17 cream-to-foam cleanser, is now endorsed by Meghan Markle.  The cleanser is designed to gently remove impurities without stripping the skin and repair any barrier damage. Over 50,000 shoppers have purchased this cleanser and 10,000 shoppers have purchased the LilyAna Naturals Anti-Aging Retinol Face Cream in the past month.

articles.title: New version of Oppo A5 Pro now available in PH
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Oppo has launched a new version of its A5 Pro smartphone in the Philippines, featuring 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. The phone includes features like water and dust resistance, Splash Touch technology, a 50MP main camera, an 8MP selfie camera, and a 5,800mAh battery with 45W fast charging. It is now available in Oppo stores and partner retailers, with the 8GB+256GB model priced at ₱13,999.

articles.title: Shoppers 'absolutely love' new deodorant at Boots that keeps them 'feeling fresh all day long'
articles.summary: Gem has launched a new line of deodorants at Boots, priced at £4 each. The range offers 48-hour protection, is gentle on the skin with a vegan, paraben, sulphate, and alcohol-free formula, and includes scents like Coconut Vanilla, Santal, Vanilla Macadamia, and Cool Fresh. The formulation features ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, and Vitamin E.

articles.title: 4 Underrated Skills That Are Worth Up To $100,000+ In 2025
articles.author: Rachel Wells
articles.summary: The article highlights several in-demand skills, including technical writing for creating documentation for new products, RFP writing to assist companies in securing contracts, WordPress development for powering websites, and packaging design to create packaging for products. Companies need these skills to support their operations, especially regarding new product launches, and skilled freelancers can earn significant income providing these services.

articles.title: Amazon Unleashes New AI Agents Ready To Take Over Your Daily Tasks
articles.author: Bernard Marr
articles.summary: Amazon is launching "Nova Act," a new agentic AI system for homes, which can perform complex tasks like booking trips and online purchases. This technology will be integrated into Alexa, potentially enhancing home AI assistance and outperforming similar tools from OpenAI and Anthropic.

articles.title: Samsung's Cute Robot Ballie Ball Is Rolling In With Gemini AI Smarts
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung's home robot, initially showcased at CES 2020, is now available for purchase. This marks the official launch of the product after a period of demonstrations.

articles.title: You can hot swap the battery on Samsung's new rugged tablet
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Samsung has announced new versions of its rugged tablets and smartphones. The Tab Active5 Pro S Pen stylus improves the tablet's usability in wet conditions, addressing recognition issues with wet fingers on the touchscreen.

articles.title: AI agents poised to take over travel industry
articles.author: Urdu Point
articles.summary: Startup Mindtrip is introducing a service that uses advanced AI to plan vacations, including suggesting destinations, travel arrangements, food options, and accommodations.

articles.title: Pagaya Prices ~$300 Million Auto ABS Transaction Demonstrating Strong Investor Confidence
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Pagaya Technologies LTD., a global technology company, delivers AI-driven product solutions.

articles.title: AICupid: The Ultimate NSFW AI Girlfriend Platform
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: AICupid, a new NSFW AI girlfriend platform, is launching with features including deep customization and lifelike interactions. The platform combines cutting-edge technology to redefine AI companions.

articles.title: Nikon's Vending Machine Mini Cameras Are Now Available in the US
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Nikon collaborated with Bandai Namco last year. Nikon and Bandai Namco are planning to bring a new set of camera.
